page.title: 18A TEN YEAR OLD IN TONBRIDGE
page.content: My name is Claire.I am ten years old and have lived in Tonbridge all my life.I live with my mum and dad and younger brother.I don't like him much_ he wakes me up in the morning with his shouting.We often fight,and although he is smaller than me he normally wins. School starts at 9.00 am and ends at 3.30.Long Mead is a nice school with a big field surrounded by ash and maple trees.I like it because there are only 150 children and I have lots of friends there. I have lots of free time after school and at weekends when I do a lot of reading.On Mondays I go to band prac_ tice,on Tuesdays and Fridays I go to dance class,and on Thursdays I have Girls' Brigade.I like living in Ton_ bridge.It's right by miles of country_ side with woods,streams and farms.
